channel.title: Update Text - Bottom left of screen!
channel.description:
I was looking at mod thourak or whatever his name is tutorials and I could not find the update text thing where it shows like "Update In - 00:08" and does that count down. Please give me a url of the tutorial. It be greatly appreciated!!!
I am just wondering. can it make everyone get kicked so that way it will like take affect of update? -thanks!

item.title: Update Text - Bottom left of screen!
item.dc:creator: @fozzy fozzy
item.description:
@fozzy wrote:

King, um… make sure that your client has the command in the first place. If I am not mistaken, the command would be ::update then the time, but I never have had to use it. Yes, the update kicks everyone from the server so you won’t have to worry about anyone online. I don’t know actually if there is a TuT for this… but I can look.

Read full topic
